title: Celery Root And Ginger Gold Apple Soup
summary: Need a gluten free, whole 30, and vegan soup? Celery Root And Ginger Gold Apple Soup could be a spectacular recipe to try. One serving contains 159 calories, 4g of protein, and 5g of fat. For $1.4 per serving, this recipe covers 12% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. This recipe serves 6. It is perfect for Autumn. A couple people made this recipe, and 13 would say it hit the spot. Head to the store and pick up ginger gold apples, yukon gold potatoes, olive oil, and a few other things to make it today. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes about 45 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 85%. This score is tremendous. Try Creamy Apple and Celery Root Soup with Grilled Cheddar, Bacon and Apple Honey Mustard Sandwich, Celery-root Soup With Bacon And Green Apple, and Creamy Celery Root And Granny Smith Apple Soup for similar recipes.
